--- In nbwrpg@y..., "Narrator" <thecode@p...> wrote:
> OOC: Dewboy, stop being a bitch. Why is it that you always look 
for some way to insult Legendary Nemasis when he's minding his own 
business? You need your ass kicked, and that's the bottom line. 
WHAT!? That's the bottom line. WHAT!? It's where the name is signed 
at the bottom of the contract. WHAT!? It's over. You wonder why 
people don't like you, especially Legendary Nemasis, well, it's 
probably because you do your best to insult him every post, you need 
to know when to stop. You act like LN is the bad guy, when it's you 
who won't end the war you disgusting little bitch. And I also 
believe that Legendary Nemasis was right. He had the character 
first, then it's his property, including the name, bottom line...
